guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"7gptv","text":"Set up the extraction on a clean lab bench in a PCR-free area. Always use a negative control during each batch of extractions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"71koh","text":"When collecting in the field, avoid touching the tip of the feathers. If wet, dry the feather on paper towel before storing it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0ikq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1u2g0","text":"Place each feather sample in a separate paper envelope, labelling: individual sample ID, collection date, location, species, collector's name, etc.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjg63","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7288q","text":"Store the envelopes with samples in an airtight dry-box with Silica gel crystals at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"087FE5703FDB11ECAE8901243515DBF1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9s7uo","text":"For each feather sample, prepare and label an   with the unique sample ID.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4td8p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":361218,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Eppendorf Safe-Lock Tubes 1.5 mL PCR clean colorless 500 tubes","linfor":"","url":"https://online-shop.eppendorf.us/US-en/Laboratory-Consumables-44512/Tubes-44515/Eppendorf-Safe-Lock-Tubes-PF-8863.html","sku":"022363212","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"EF509BE03F2511EC8A9AF544792B0EA4","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":214,"name":"Eppendorf","link":"https://www.eppendorf.com","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"suko","text":"For each feather sample, get:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8g4bl","text":"a clean A4 paper sheet","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjka1","text":"a pair of  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1g6c9","text":"a sterile  .","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6tl7l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":3592,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Gloves","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"E11780C03F2011EC8A9AF544792B0EA4","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":9024,"mol_weight":0,"name":"scalpel blades","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"25181A503F2111EC8A9AF544792B0EA4","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"24r5q","text":"Put on the  , remove the feather sample from the envelope and place it on the clean A4 paper sheet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":3592,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Gloves","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"522611A03F2111EC8A9AF544792B0EA4","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"860pb","text":"Remove a   from the sterile packaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"asjtp","text":"Large feathers: carefully cut out a window around the blood clot from the superior umbilicus of the feather (this can usually be seen just below the vane).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4d9fh","text":"See details in:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9g3i9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ba2cv","text":"Small feathers: Chop up the entire shaft of small feathers (\u003c20 mm).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t4ra","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1cbof","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6jk58","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":9024,"mol_weight":0,"name":"scalpel blades","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"7C4993303F2111EC8A9AF544792B0EA4","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"citation","mutability":"","data":{"authors":"HorvÃ¡th, M.B.; MartÃ­nez-Cruz, B.; Negro, J.J.; KalmÃ¡r, L.; Godoy, J.A.","can_edit":1,"date":"1100710440","doi":"http://dx.doi.org/10.1111/j.0908-8857.2005.03370.x","guid":"669791D03F2211EC8A9AF544792B0EA4","id":1395,"journal":"Journal of Avian Biology","protocol_id":null,"title":"An overlooked DNA source for non-invasive genetic analysis in birds"}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"F42649203FD011ECBE15E30864CDA29A","height":367,"id":190743,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1biv1","text":"Dry blood clot from the superior umbilicus of a large macaw feather.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"DNA_extraction_feather.jpg","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f4i3izfw.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f4izizfw.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f4i2izfw.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f4iyizfw.webp","width":550}}}}
